name: Time Watcher
description:
Time Watcher is a simple dodging game where you use the power of... time?
This game is to be considered as a concept, but might not receive updates.

Made with only 3 days out of the 10 allotted time due to a self-imposed restriction:
I had to learn a new language (Dart) and a new framework (Flutter).

Credits:
Code written by yours truly (yes, flew this one solo),
SFX generated using SFXR on my device,
I definitely didn't create Dart and Flutter, not even the MaterialIcons.
